CN.content:

Paragraph: The best performance was obtained with the thickness of the active layer of 80-90 nm , the copolymers : PC 70 BM ratio of 1 : 2 ( by weight ) and the Ca / Al used as the cathode.

Let's think step by step.

| the thickness of the active layer |

| the copolymers |
| PC 70 BM |
| the Ca / Al |

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Note: I have removed "the thickness of the active layer" as it refers to a property of a material rather than the material itself.

These are the three "Property Name" entities identified in the paragraph. They are presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". The entities are written precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| thickness of the active layer |

These are the two "Property Name" entities identified in the paragraph that clearly refer to "Material Property". They are presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". The entities are written precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

The other entity "Ca / Al used as the cathode" is not a material property, it is a material or a component used in the experiment.
